DOC.brief_summary: This propose study examine whether health coach improve management COPD population vulnerable patient care 'safety-net ' clinic . The study design randomize control trial patient moderate severe COPD . Patients randomize health coach group usual care group . Those health coach group receive 9 month active health coaching . Outcome variable measure baseline 9 month
